website_summaries.verdict: Whether it’s to prepare for a power outage or a wedding, this set of long-lasting and stylish taper candles is an excellent deal.
pros: Decent price for top quality candles
7.5 hours of burn time per candle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; no dripping
customer_reviews.text: Use these all the time with no dripping problems whatsoever. I use 6 at a time while taking 2-3 hour baths and use the remaining tapers for another 3+ hour bath, after which I am left with 3-4 inch stubs to spare for use during power outages. Best of all (at least in my opinion), each candle is NOT individually wrapped in cellophane — too time-consuming! — so they are easy to use immediately. The candles arrived well-packaged; not one was broken. Good quality. Great value. Just ordered 3 more boxes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anon1234

customer_reviews.title: NOT dripless. NOT 7.5 hour last time.
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT dripless. I bought these for my wedding and they dripped EVERYWHERE. On the candlesticks, tables, runners....everywhere. And I had almost all of them lit around the venue. It’s been a nightmare getting the candle wax off everything. Additionally, they did not last for 7.5 hours. I lit the candles at around 7pm, and by 11pm they had burned to the stub and many were already out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: BEST. CANDLES. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tapers I've ever used. I've had issues in the past of "dripless" candles dripping A TON and being completely burned down after about 1 hour at the most. Even the Bolsius brand of regular tapers was a disappointment, but these... wow I'm never buying anything else. They didn't drip once, they lasted 3 hours and only burned down about 1/4 of the way. So glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for candelabra addicts
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to use tapers on a regular basis, this box of 100 will keep you supplied for a while. I bought my first box about one year ago. Minimum drip factor. You can get taper tacky to ensure a firm placement in different holders, however warming the candle ends and twisting firmly into place seems to work well. They’re full-sized, 10” tapers and look great on a table.
customer_reviews.author: CafeMartin

customer_reviews.title: Quality suddenly went way down. They now burn very fast & black smoke.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these exact candles in a church setting & they previously were very good. The last batch I ordered has been horrible. They burn down very quickly. There is no way that these candles burn for 7.5 hours anymore. They have been down 2/3rds leaving only 1/3 of the candle in less than an hour. This batch also had many candles that broke way too easily. I am going to try one more batch to see if I got a bad batch, but never again if they act like this last box I received.
customer_reviews.author: J.Gustafsson

customer_reviews.title: Great value candles
customer_reviews.text: We get through long Montana winters by having romantic, candlelight dinners every night. We have a candle chandelier that holds six candles, and found that using this every night, all winter long was a little expensive. So, it was a treat to discover these affordable candles. They rarely drip and provide nice light at a reasonable price. The only downside is that some of the candles in the box arrive broken, but we'll cut those, and use them for shorter candlestick holders on the table. All in all, a great product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: These are premium basic candles at an economy price. They fit any standard candle base, which makes them ultimately useful. I use them for emergency lighting and/or heat. They are unscented, which is preferable, to make them ok for those with chemical sensitivities. From a degreed engineer, high recommendation for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Turner

customer_reviews.title: It kind of smells like bees wax
customer_reviews.text: The candles are well made and they definitely do the job. The reason I am only giving them 4 stars is because they have an oder to them. It kind of smells like bees wax. If you don't mind that smell, then there won't be a problem. I haven't burned them yet because they are for my daughters wedding. If they are made of bees wax, I'm sure they will be good.
customer_reviews.author: Klebe Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great candle, good price
customer_reviews.text: These are really great candles - burn evenly and sufficiently long. Although they look like they are for restaurants, they look really nice just on an average dinner table. I've looked for a lot of candles, I know this brand, they do not disappoint. NOte: I've been back and re-bought these - great service, greatproduct. A+
customer_reviews.author: PaintPots

customer_reviews.title: Great Convenient Box at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good deal on candles. My husband and I love having these on our dinner table, and we're always running out. They are a pain in the touche to buy. Stores do not stock them so readily. This box should keep us for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles are study and well packaged. Even though my Amazon shipping box came damaged, the candles were unharmed and not a single piece had been broken. The candles hold up well and have been enjoyed around the dinner table and at special events.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Candles
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic candles, burn cleanly, drip-less and no flickering (when there is no breeze). IF you have a glass/crystal holder these are NOT designed for those, the wick goes to the bottom of the candle so you MUST pay attention and blow out the candles before the heat cracks your holder.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very nice tapers.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the purpose of decorating with my pressed flowers. I am very happy with the purchase; nice smooth candles that look beautiful! Found a few broken but that is to be expected in a box of 100. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nesha

customer_reviews.title: A very good deal
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of candles. These are a good size, they don't drip, and they last the usual amount of time. Definitely worth the money if you need that many candles!
customer_reviews.author: R. Park

customer_reviews.title: Check all the boxes!
customer_reviews.text: They are bulk, not requiring unwrapping of cellophane for each candles as some seller's products! This is a big deal for me as I like having candles lit for dinner. And, AND, they don't drip! Lastly they are not as expensive as many choices. Win, win, win!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Ordered several times.
customer_reviews.text: Very good ! I wish it will cost less, but still better than any other company. Very good delivery, box is very nice and comfortable, if for gift really nice. No smell, burning about 8+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Agee

customer_reviews.title: Best value for candles that I've found! My 4th purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, delivered timely. We have candle-light supper every night, so we use about 80 candles a year, and these are the best value we've found!
customer_reviews.author: Schef Wright

customer_reviews.title: Candles galore
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these for a wedding. None were broken when they arrived since they were well-packed. I tried one and it burned without smoke or drips. The color is white. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are not dripless candles and burn very fast.
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as dripless but they are not and they do not have a 7.5 hour burn time.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Barker

customer_reviews.title: Broken candles.
customer_reviews.text: The intact candles are great but many are broken when they arrive in their packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Roaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful candles, that smell nice and don't smoke (too much) will be great if the lights go out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I love the product, it came quickly, and was exactly as advertised! Thank you so much for sharing your products with the world at affordable prices :) Our neighborhood has frequent power outages, and your candles have saved us many a bored nights :) Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Williamson

customer_reviews.title: They arrived as advertised and were better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sourse for approx. 100 hundred candles for a Christmas party. Your candles were the right number for a very reasonable price. They arrived as advertised and were better than expected, as they seem to be drip free making clean up easier. We used probably 80 of them. The only fault I would have with them was that some of them were cracked, but with some care in handling were usable. I would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Only in certain windy situations do the candles have any sort of drip. These are my go-to candles!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Thies

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Use on our dining table. We can go through a lot of candles, so this is a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Ladyfingers

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good return for the price per candle. Tapers burn well and cleanly, giving good light.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne St.Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Not actually White
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and received what looks like ivory candles. I sent it back, thinking it was a distribution mistake, and re-ordered. The second box came in, still ivory! They seem to be great quality and none were broken, but I need white!
customer_reviews.author: Marley Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Candles had a strange odor. Though they burned fine we thought they may be causing an allergic reaction. Had to discard them.
customer_reviews.author: James Truini

customer_reviews.title: Candles of Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used these candles before, and they are well worth the price. They do not drip. They burn cleanly. They are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received ivory and instead of white candles
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these white candles for church for months. Last week I received three cases of ivory colored candles instead of my white candles. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles! I plan to use them for my wedding. They burn for a very long time and don’t drip AT ALL. I use a “stick-em” product to make sure they stay put in the holders. I’m considering buying another box just so that I can keep lighting them around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Redford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality candles. They burn evenly and are solid white.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: They worked beautifully. They burned evenly
customer_reviews.text: I received the 10 inch candles on the estimated date given. We used them for our (4) sets of Candelabras on Easter Morning. They worked beautifully. They burned evenly, did not smoke or drip and we were very pleased and the price was great! We would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Candles were bright white and packed nicely. Quality was good and none were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our church service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these candles for our church Christmas Eve service. They were great! Smokeless and dripless! And only burned about an inch during the 1 hour service. Product performed as advertised. Definitely would order them again. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Judy Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent burning candle.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I was looking for and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: cjhealy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Candles!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles!!!! We used them for a wedding reception and they burned evenly and lasted for 6-7 hours. I couldn't have been happier with using these candles l. I would definitely recommend these to my friends and family to buy!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Groves

customer_reviews.title: Burns consistently and no drips
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these twice and will again. We burn candles every night with dinner and have found we like the tapers. These do not drip and burn consistently. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Andi Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not 10 "
customer_reviews.text: Candles are not 10 inches long. They are 9.5 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, and at a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. They are exactly as advertised, and arrived on time with only one or two with minor cracks. I will buy these again!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: They work well - great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Candles came quickly, and none were broken. They work well - great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hunziker

customer_reviews.title: These are the best tapers I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tapers I have ever purchased. They don't drip at all and have a nice flame. I already tried to reorder and they were not available. I hope they are on Amazon again soon.
customer_reviews.author: jamie foster

customer_reviews.title: ... candles for our Scandinavian inspired cafe and they are great to create a great sense of hygge
customer_reviews.text: We buy these candles for our Scandinavian inspired cafe and they are great to create a great sense of hygge. Minimal drip and long lasting burn time. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The best seller
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and good quality i would recommen to everyobe
customer_reviews.author: Supansa Limprasert

customer_reviews.title: Candles are dripless as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I found these candles long lasting and best of all really dripless!!! Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C Headrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candles! They arrived promptly and undamaged and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Edie B

customer_reviews.title: Candles burn brightly and do not drip.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for my synagogue Friday night services, and they have worked very well. They have not dripped and they light easily. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Gross

customer_reviews.title: They are affordable and beautiful, and the delivery time was super quick
customer_reviews.text: These candles worked perfectly for an advent wreath workshop at church. They are affordable and beautiful, and the delivery time was super quick!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mowell

customer_reviews.title: Buy these candles
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product through out the year and love it!
customer_reviews.author: ckob2080

customer_reviews.title: We are using these in a sauna with extreme heat ...
customer_reviews.text: We are using these in a sauna with extreme heat and humidity. They are holding up well, not bending or dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Burn brightly, dripless
customer_reviews.text: Good quality - packed well - would buy again if a little less pricey.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles are great. They burn evenly and don't drip.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN MARIE DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably fast shipping! How do they do it? The best deal on candles I know of.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Black

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a very good price. I'll definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Candles arrived safe and sound - not a single broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality, long lasting and very little "drip"
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, good quality, long lasting and very little "drip". A great value - will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Dawne

customer_reviews.title: The candles are perfect. We have them for emergencys and such
customer_reviews.text: The candles are perfect. We have them for emergencys and such, they were shipped and packed very well and came quickly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rosendahl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This photo was taken after about 3.5 hours of burning. There is absolutely no dripping!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Evans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, none were damaged in shipment and they burn without dripping. Wonderful to have such a plentiful supply!
customer_reviews.author: The Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles
customer_reviews.text: Ever try to buy candles at a retail outlet? Religious candles aplenty / votive candles easy to find / regular tapers - not typically available and if available, offered at a ridiculous price. My family likes to have candles lit, especially at this time of year. Although I have about 40 candles left from previous orders, I bought the pack of 100 to get through the holidays plus have candles for emergency purposes. This is a very good product!
customer_reviews.author: LifeIsGrand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The candles burn slowly & evenly. I'd purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome amount of candles and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I recently bought a 3 candle candalabra (spelling, couldn't get it) and I wanted a not too tall candle and it needed to fit :) It did! It looks beautiful now! And I have plenty if electric ever goes out! Put them in my prepping stuff :) Thank you so much for offering this many in one box!
customer_reviews.author: happygirl

customer_reviews.title: great price. The first pair we've using are drip-less
customer_reviews.text: great price. The first pair we've using are drip-less. I have not recorded the burn time, but seem to last reasonably well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Doud

customer_reviews.title: taper candle light wedding
customer_reviews.text: Bought Bolsius candles for daughters wedding in in few months. Chose Bolsius because they were a good price and my European friend raves on qaulity of products made in Europe and these candles will comfirm either way. Plus they said dripless and smokeless. First thought I like look and feel of candle. I can't burn one to test bc we would be short one for wedding reception. Initial rating 3 stars because shipping was speedy and as stated, regarding candle like look and feel, when we burn candles in October this rating will be higher or lower. So to be continued...
customer_reviews.author: cheryl wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Most affordable of decent non-poisonous taper candles. (Meaning you're not breathing in scary petroleum sh*t). Used to get the boxes of 10 (or 12?) then I went big on this purchase. Maybe excessive but the price went way down per unit and I burn a lot of candles in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, drip free, and beautiful taper
customer_reviews.text: I love real candles and have been using them for decades. Bolsius candles are wonderful and are a reasonable cost to light candles on a daily basis. It adds so much to the ambiance of the room and is good for the soul. These tapers are beautiful and I go through them quickly because once I light them I don't want to blow them out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dripless!
customer_reviews.text: Renting candelabra for wedding and can not let wax get on them. These candles were amazing. Walked around the house with them to represent air current in large venue and it still didn't drip. Downside, the 10" taper only lasted 5 hours, not 7 as someone had previously mentioned. In a breeze it will burn out much quicker. Anticipate 2.5 - 3 hours for 10" taper in a large ballroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bev C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect use for candlelight Christmas Eve service
customer_reviews.text: We needed long lasting, white candles for our Christmas Eve services. These candles fit our pew holders and burned beautifully throughout the service.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny May

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are pretty pretty good candles, price point is good, they look great, and love the fact that they aren’t individually wrapped!
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: they burn clean, no smoke, no drips, no mess. I really like them , would not hesitate to buy them again
customer_reviews.author: David E Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful candles, no soot, no dripping. Definitely will be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: david a.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and dripless
customer_reviews.text: Great candles for any altar and safe as they are dripless and it fits tightly in candleholder
customer_reviews.author: Maria Carolina Paraventi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as described
customer_reviews.text: Timely, as described, these candles are classic, burn cleanly and leave no odor. I haven't timed how long they last -- using them as dinner table candles -- but they look great! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking candles that lasted just fine through my 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking candles that lasted just fine through my 2 hour wedding and can probably be used again. 10 inches was a good length, I wasn't worried about them falling or tipping off candelabras and they look classy. A super good deal for the amount of candles you get.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect in the house. Remember no candle is dripless in a breeze. I am very satisfied despite other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: larae

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: High quality candles. Burn beautifully and don't drip. Nice to have a big box and not be hunting for candles.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality no drip candles
customer_reviews.text: Premium quality no drip candles. The wicks are high quality and produce a tall flame. I used 4 so far. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: rrr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. The price is perfect, too. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Balloonsanddecor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Burn
customer_reviews.text: These are the best taper candles I have ever used, by far. They burn really clean, with no excess wax melting on the candleholders, and the smell great (although, there's not much of an odour to begin with).
customer_reviews.author: L. South

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great Candles. As a Dutch woman I know Bolsius very well. Was super excited to find them on Amazon and they didn't let me down. Clean burn and no dripping. Only wish they had more colors
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on very good quality tapered candles
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on very good quality tapered candles. Exactly what I was looking for, and made for a great Christmas gift. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need candles? Here's your guy.
customer_reviews.text: The candles come exactly as shown and burn very well. Definitely a 5-star product for the count and price.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: The candles are good, burn well and the price is very reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Buying a 100 at a time was the right move. The candles are good, burn well and the price is very reasonable. Also, it was nice to receive the product so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: tonia burrow

customer_reviews.title: We Enjoy These Candles Nightly
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy candles with our dinner every night. These candles are especially nice, since they are almost always completely dripless. Occasionaly, one sprouts a leak. They burn evenly and leave no wax on the table. We ordered a large box this time, because I didn't realize how large the box was (we have a problem with space in our condo.) We found a way to store the extra candles. We will order the smaller box next time. We love using these candles nightly.
customer_reviews.author: calclerkret79

customer_reviews.title: Not White!
customer_reviews.text: It says "White" on the box. However, they are more beige / tan color. You "MIGHT" be able to say they are a "Natural" white. But they are not "Paper" white. When you put the off white candles in the church's white candelabras they stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Davis

customer_reviews.title: and they are wonderful. We found our supply drastically low
customer_reviews.text: We use these candles in my church, and they are wonderful. We found our supply drastically low, just before Christmas. I ordered more and received them in just 2 days. Great candles! Great service!
customer_reviews.author: misty

product_meta.title: BOLSIUS Long Household White Taper Candles - 10-inch Unscented Premium Quality Wax - 7.5 Hour Long Burning Dripless Candles Bulk Pack of 100 for Home Decor, Wedding, Parties and Special Occasions
product_meta.description:
BOLSIUS Household Long White Table Candle Sets - Fragrance-Free High Quality 100% Cotton Wick and Paraffin Wax Candle Pack of 100

Set of our classic long burning candles is perfect for fine dining, events, baby shower, Christmas party, and any special occasions. Our 10 inch long candles are made from 100% paraffin wax and have a pure cotton wick braided individually. Keep your home completely clean and smoke-free! An unscented tall table candle provides more illumination than any other candle. Feel free to have a candle burn all night long during an intimate movie date with your significant other or a casual dinner with friends without any hassle.

Our slow burning candles feature -
✔ 10-inch height
✔ 100% quality cotton wick
✔ 100% paraffin wax
✔ Smoke-free
✔ Dripless
✔ 7.5 Long Burning Hours 

With our attractive fragrance-free White candles set, any interior design is enhanced tenfold and immediately looks stylish and sophisticated. Bolsius candles sticks are ideal for restaurants, weddings, or your dinner table at home, holiday season. Order now to save more on our value pack of 100 neatly packaged no drip candle sticks.
feature_bullets: COMPLIMENT ANY SPECIAL OCCASION WITH BOLSIUS WHITE CANDLE SET: Our 10 inch long unscented candles improve your home décor without spending a fortune. With these tall candles, you can decorate and add warmth to your house in seconds. Our tapered candles are perfect for indoor and outdoor use like wedding ceremonies, parties, candlelight dinner, synagogues, and churches.

DRIPLESS CANDLES CRAFTED WITH QUALITY AND CARE - Bolsius tall and beautiful unscented candles are crafted from 100% Paraffin Wax for a pleasant flame. The braided wicks are made up of 100% Cotton, which is carefully dipped numerous times in supreme quality wax, to give it the perfect shine and elegant look.

PACK OF 100 MULTIPURPOSE WHITE TABLE CANDLE STICKS - The super value pack carries 100 tall, and elegant design chime candles which can be used in commercial decoration or at home decor. Perfect fit for all the standard candlestick and taper candle holders. Our unscented table candles can be used as the centerpiece to enhance weddings, buffet tables, and all events

CLEAN BURNING UNSCENTED LONG CANDLES - Our dripless candle stick burns a clean and smooth flame for up to 7.5 hours. These unscented stick candles are 10-inch long and have a 3/4-inch base diameter. It will provide you a warm and comfortable ambiance during festival times as lent candles, advent candles

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - Bolsius always gives priority to customer satisfaction. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with the quality of our dripless taper candles, feel free to contact us, and we'll make things right.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
